Author: winEblues
Text: It was so fucking weird. I've dealt with many creepy men, but none quite as bold as him. As soon as he left, I told my fiance what happened and he was PISSED. But then he understood why he was suddenly being such a dick to me.  If anything, I now embrace my flab even more than before. So thanks, weird handsy old guy. This interaction would have devastated me just a few months ago.

Author: zestylimevinaigrette
Text: i’m sorry that happened to you. that’s weird asf.
